name: Professional Tennis Simulator
description:
In this game you will have the possibility to play seven different championships, including the four Grand Slams, so, depending on the competition, you will play on clay, grass or synthetic surface while facing someone of the 11 best ATP players. You also will have the option to train with another player, the computer or using the ball-launcher machine. With the serve training and choosing equipment and surface, you will also improve your game on all the possible conditions.

If this game is called a simulator it's because: your shots will be different depending on the net distance, the effect and direction of the ball in serve will be defined by you, besides, you will have a total control of the ball direction, shot power and shot style on the moment of the impact (according to the pressed keys), you will be able to access to game stats on every moment, and finally, you will have the possibility of choosing racket and slippers (all of them adapted for every situation).
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, DOS, MSX | Combined View

shot.caption: The first screen displayed is the company logo. This screen follows shortly after and stays on-screen until the game is loaded
The game displays the developer credits before this, the game's main menu.
Option 0 from the main menu. First the number of players is entered, then the name of each player.
Then the controller must be specified
The tournament menu Option 1 from this menu allows the player(s) to set up their names in the tournament. The player(s) then show on the ranking table.
Option 0 from the tournament menu shows the current standings
Option 3 from the tournament menu shows the pairings for the current tournament
Then the game begins. Moby has just served .....
.... and it went wide. The target that appears as the serve is made indicates where it will land.
Serving was not easy to master, so getting a second service was a sign of considerable improvement
After the first game the players take a break while the game shows the player stats
After the break the game resumes with the dummy player ready to serve
Option 2 from the tournament menu starts with confirming the controller to be used before starting the game
Controles: Option 1 from the main menu shows the keyboard controls for each player
Equipamiento: Option 2 from the main menu allows the player to customise the characters kit, first shoes...
Entrenamiento: Option 3 from the main menu is the training menu where the player can practice their strokes.
Caracteristicas: Option 4 from the main menu allows the player to change the type of surface (grass, clay, etc), the court, and the number of sets played.
